divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting in my hot tub and noticed 4 different blue slowly pulsating light about Loveland, Colorado . I immediately believed they were UFOs because I have never seen anything like it. The bright lights randomly flashed in increments of about 5 seconds and randomly moved throughout the sky. After about an hour they disappeared. I was in awe.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
Summary: Bright blue lights randomly flashing in three directions
